Join the Team
Looking for a great job in Pensacola?
Come join the Bogeys Family
Bogeys is a premier high-end golf suite venue and grill offering exceptional dining experiences, state-of-the-art indoor golf simulators, and a luxurious atmosphere for guests to enjoy.  Our mission is to create a fun environment where patrons of all ages can make memories and have an unforgettable gaming experience. We believe in the well-being of our team and what a difference that can make for our valued customers’ experience here.  We know by creating a safe and unique place to gather, we will be a meaningful part of our community.
Available Positions

Bartender
Involves a blend of bartending duties, providing demonstrations and instructions on our golf simulators, and ensuring a memorable experience for our guests.
Apply Now

Server
This role involves a blend of serving duties, providing demonstrations and instructions on our golf simulators, and ensuring a memorable experience for our guests.
Apply Now

cook
Come work in our cafe-style kitchen preparing and cooking a variety of delicious dishes for our customers. The ideal candidate should have a love for culinary arts, a strong attention to detail, and exceptional customer service.
Apply Now

private parties & Group events
Let’s party! Bogeys is the perfect party lounge for your group event. We offer a fantastic range of indoor sports, games, and activities for your celebration. Mix a little friendly competition with our delicious food and drink menu to create an unforgettable group event!
Plan Your Event
group events: 20 people or more
vip party rooms
Round up the crew and reserve our private VIP room! It features two multi-sport simulators, two booths, and plenty of room for 15 people or more!
Private VIP room: 2 Booths
$110 per Hour
$75 Food & Beverage minimum per Hour
Summer Kids Parties
Looking for the best
kids summer party
idea that’s active, exciting, and budget-friendly? Bogey’s Golf Suites has you covered with our all-new
weekday party package
!
For just
$225
, host up to
10 kids
for
2 hours
of fun in our cool, air-conditioned venue — perfect for summer birthdays, end-of-school celebrations, or just beating the Florida heat.
Learn More
Leave the party Hosting to us
We offer all-inclusive packages that are perfect for your group event of 20 or more. Bogeys matches incredible in-suite service with epic gameplay, food, and drinks so you can enjoy connecting and celebrating.
Book your party
Let’s Plan the Best Party or Event

Company Events
Entertain corporate clients or “team build” with your work crew in a unique, super fun setting to celebrate, play, and party!

Birthday Parties
Ready to throw the most epic birthday party? You’ve come to the right place. Come battle your buddies and celebrate with virtual sports & gameplay.

School & Church Events
We offer the perfect event packages for schools, churches, and other organizations to get out together for bonding and celebration.

Fundraisers
Are you raising money for a good cause? Have the good folks who care gather somewhere awesome! Whether it’s a large group or a full venue rental, we’ve got you covered.

Holiday Parties
Get your swing on while you celebrate the season! Get up to Bogeys for an epic holiday bash or festive office celebration. Play, practice, and party in the merriest atmosphere.

Graduation Parties
Toss that cap and get up to the ultimate destination to make memories! We meticulously plan out the perfect vibes, providing your favorite virtual sports, games, food, and drinks for you and your loved ones.

Come party with us
Enjoy Pensacola’s New Event space
Looking for the perfect party spot to entertain everyone? We’re here to help you host corporate clients, bond with colleagues, and celebrate your special days with family and friends.
We recommend you reserve your party as far in advance as you can. Just use our Group Event Form to get planning with us.
